mapper.select: select b_no||'' as "B_NO", subject, writer, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd(dy)', 'nls_date_language=korean') as "REG_DATE" , readcount||'' as "READCOUNT", print_level||'' as "PRINT_LEVEL" from board order by group_no desc, print_no
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where b_no=#{b_no}
mapper.select: select b_no, subject, writer, content, email, reg_date, readcount from board where b_no=${b_no}
select count(*) from board where b_no=#{b_no}
select count(*) from board where b_no=#{b_no} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update board set writer=#{writer}, subject=#{subject}, email=#{email}, content=#{content} where b_no=#{b_no} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where group_no = (select group_no from board where b_no=#{b_no}) and print_no = (select print_no+1 from board where b_no=#{b_no}) and print_level = (select print_level+1 from board where b_no=#{b_no})
mapper.update: update board set print_no=print_no-1 where b_no=#{b_no} group_no = (select group_no from board where b_no=#{b_no}) and print_no > (select print_no from board where b_no=#{b_no})
mapper.delete: delete from board where b_no=#{b_no} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update board set print_no=print_no+1 where b_no=#{b_no} group_no = (select group_no from board where b_no=#{b_no}) and print_no > (select print_no from board where b_no=#{b_no})
